title: Kilauea Bakery and Pau Hana Pizza
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Juice bar, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little spot nestled among the shops in Kong Lung Center, enroute to Kilauea Lighthouse. Pizza, soy cheese, sandwiches, soups, baked goods, coffee drinks, and juices. Will make a pizza with soy cheese (maybe not vegan, need to confirm) upon request.
